topics.body:
Guys; I may have to semi-leave for a month cause I have a bunch of shit I need to do and wasting time isn't exactly for when you don't have time to waste.


Things I have to do in the next month:
1)Learn Java
2)Learn Pre-Calculas
3)Finish marketing class
4)Finish working on feminizing my voice
5)Laser hair removal for the next month (3 hours a day for a month) so that it'll stop growing
6)Clean and cook every day
7)Find a job
8)Other stuff

Side note: corsets are fucking uncomfortable.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5573e0356368726b75001645#post_5573e0356368726b75001645
When someone looks at you and sneers just remember that prick is basing it off of being a complete dumbass, and isn't worth your concern, nature made a slight error and you as a sentient creature the closet thing to a god in all known existence have decided to say fuck that, You have decided to punch the feeble foundations of the universe in the face because you control your life, not some random bullshit, when was the last time those assholes did that? You are choosing to walk a harder path because you want to, so every time some prick tries to pass judgement on you, ask your self when did they ever show this much courage? So hold your head high, so some kid may one day see you and realize they too aren't bound by the whims of fate, Best of luck to you glorious jerk.
